text: John Neville, CM, OBE (May 2, 1925 - November 19, 2011)"Actor John Neville dies at 86", CBC News/Canada Press, 21 November 2011 was a British stage, movie, and television actor. He was in The Adventures of Baron Munchausen (1988). He was born in Willesden, London, England on May 2, 1925. He was married to Caroline Hopper from 1949 until his death in 2011. They had 6 children. He died in Toronto, Ontario, Canada in November 19, 2011 from natural causes. He had Alzheimer's disease. He was 86 years old."Passing of John Neville""John Neville obituary", The Guardian, 21 November 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from London Category:Actors from Ontario
title: John Neville
